segments.text: I notice the sunlight pouring through the window, casting warmth over the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a beautiful day outside, so peaceful and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, I can’t shake this sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea the water is overflowing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so lost in thought while chaos brews nearby?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And here’s this boy climbing on a stool like he’s invincible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems shaky, and I can’t help but wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That girl beside him looks so hopeful, but it’s misguided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep thinking, 'What will happen if he falls?'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen scene is so ordinary, yet it feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
